original_text: You are bad. But even you know how to give good things to your children. Your Father in heaven knows much better than you do how to give good things to his children. So he will give the Holy Spirit to everyone who asks him.’
korean_text: 너희가 악할지라도 좋은 것을 자식에게 줄 줄 알거든 하물며 너희 하늘 아버지께서 구하는 자에게 성령을 주시지 않겠느냐 하시니라

sentences.original_text: how to give good things to your children.
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 아들들에게 좋은 것을 주는 방법을.

sentences.original_text: knows much better than you do
how to give good things to his children.
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 아들들에게 좋은 것을 주시는 방법을.

sentences.original_text: So he will give the Holy Spirit
